data.name: Sqlite Db Create
data.value: CREATE TABLE [feeds] ( [id] INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, [ddt] DATETIME DEFAULT NULL, [udt] DATETIME DEFAULT NULL, [title] VARCHAR DEFAULT NULL, [alt] VARCHAR DEFAULT NULL, [note] VARCHAR DEFAULT NULL, [url] VARCHAR DEFAULT NULL, [content] VARCHAR DEFAULT NULL );

data.name: Dic RssFeed
data.value: title|/title pubDate|/pubDate link|/link enclosure|/enclosure/@url enclosure-length|/enclosure/@length enclosure-type|/enclosure/@type content|/content:encoded comments|/comments creator|/creator description|/description

data.name: html css
Flash Object
data.value: <object> <param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/@{video-id}?version=3&hl=en_US&rel=0"></param> <param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param> <param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param> <embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/@{video-id}?version=3&hl=en_US&rel=0" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true"></embed> </object>

data.name: Html Javascript
data.value:
<script src="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.10.2/jquery.min.js"></script>
    <script language='javascript'>
      $(document).ready(function(){
        $('li#cf1').click(function(){ changeStyle("format-code"); });
        $('li#cf2').click(function(){ changeStyle("format-mode"); });
        $('li#cf3').click(function(){ changeStyle("code-format"); });
      });
      function changeStyle(nam) { $("section#content").removeAttr("class").attr("class",nam); }
    </script>
